Sipna College of Enginnering And Technology, Amravati

Event Name : Paper Castle

Date and Time : 8th February 2024

Location : Sipna College for Engineering And Technology, Amravati

Playing with cards and building a paper castle was a beautiful memory of our childhood. It is the game of stacking playing cards on top of each other, often in the shape of a pyramid to create a tallest tower.
Each team/player will be provided with a deck of cards and participants are asked to create a tallest skyscraper out of it following the understated rules.

Entry Fees :

â‚¹300/- per team (max 3 participants)

Time : 1 Hour

Setup time - 10 mins Work time - 50 mins

Coordinators :

  • 1) Vaibhavi Milkhe : 7020788486
  • 2) Ronit Lanjewar : 8624832662
  • 3) Siddhi Umap : 9011588257
  • 4) Falguni Sahu : 9770165800

Rules & Regulations

  • 1. Mini 1 and maxi 3 players can participate in this event.
  • 2. Deck of cards and cardboard base will be provided.
  • 3. Cutting, pasting and interlocking to playing cards is not allowed.
  • 4. You will have to consume all cards compulsorily.
  • 5. After completing, be quick to submit your model and record the height.
  • 6. Team will have unlimited chances in the given time to construct and to record the height.
  • 7. In case of multiple successful attempts, the Highest Recorded height will be considered for evaluation
  • 8. In case of tie, Winner will be decided by giving extra time to construct
  • 9. Bring your college ID Cards and Receipt on event day
  • 10. All the participants will be awarded with "Participation Certificates ".
